metadata.title: CVE-2015-8669 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
libraries/config/messages.inc.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.12,4.4.x before 4.4.15.2, and 4.5.x before 4.5.3.1 allows remote attackers toobtain sensitive information via a crafted request, which reveals the fullpath in an error message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8669` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.5.3.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.5.3.1-1').
